1.content: Who is the hero of our story?
1.title: Our Hero

11.content: Who will he be facing off against?
11.title: Ant-Man (Marvel Universe)

113.content:
It's night in New York City. High above the city a penthouse has been rented out for an exclusive art show. The view is stunning. The guests are posh. The art is very modern. The star piece is a cat-shaped amulet carved from a rare rainbow gem found only in Wakanda.

Nick Fury director of SHIELD has good reason to believe that the Black Cat will attempt to steal the priceless amulet and so he's assigned Ant-Man to guard it after the show is over.

Ant-Man arrives shortly after the viewing party wraps up. Where does he hide himself to await the Black Cat?
113.title: Black Cat

choices: Ant-Man gets lost in Black Cat's cleavage!
1132.content:
Ant-Man takes up position on the cat-amulet itself and waits.

It's not long before the Black Cat appears. She uses the extendable claws on her gloves to cut a perfect hole in the skylight and repels down into the gallery with her grapple-gun

As she lands Ant-Man has an incredible view of her perfect body clad in her skin-tight uniform.

Nick Fury gave strict instructions to 'follow' the Black Cat back to her boss. This may be the perfect way to finally nab the 'Kingpin of Crime' SHIELD has been hunting for so long

Ant-Man plans to hang onto the amulet and 'tag along' with the Cat. But he doesn't plan for her to store the amulet deep in her cleavage!
1132.title: On the Amulet (Cleavage Smother)

choices: His size controls are crushed against the side of the amulet!
He manages to hang on with no damage!
11322.content:
Black Cat skips across the empty gallery and smirks down at the beautiful rainbow-gem cat-amulet. Ant-Man gazes up at the cat-suit clad giantess above him and hides behind the 'head' of the amulet. He's barely a millimeter tall standing in it's shoulder, far too tiny for the Black Cat to notice.

Somehow the predatory look in her eyes makes him feel very nervous even though he knows she can't see him. Of course to even see her face he has to gaze up past the swell of her mountainous breasts, barely contained by her cat-suit!

Black Cat casually reaches down and plucks the cat-amulet from it's pedestal. Immediately alarm sirens go off but Black Cat's smile merely broadens. She'll be long gone before the police arrive!

She drops the cat-amulet into her cleavage, places her finger on top of it and slowly presses it down, watching the amulet sink into her cleavage. Once it's 'submerged' she slowly pulls her finger out of her cleavage. The amulet it completely buried in her heaving breasts, invisible from sight.

***

Ant-Man feels nervous as Black Cat picks up the amulet, but he almost panics when she drops it into her cleavage! Suddenly he finds himself i na valley of heaving pink flesh with the Black Cats smirking face looking down at him! What a view!

Then her finger slams onto the head of the amulet and it begins to slowly sink into Black Cat's 'valley'

'uh oh!' Ant-Man says to himself as Black Cats breasts spill over the amulet's shoulders and slam him into the side of the cat's head

He's squeezed against the amulet by tons of hot pink flesh! Black Cat's breasts really are like mountains to him at this size! And he's caught in an avalanche!

Ant-Man feels himself sliding away from the amulet as her skin's friction drags at him. He clings tightly to the amulet not wanting to become lost in Black Cat's cleavage!
11322.title: Ant-Man hangs onto the amulet!

12.content: Who will he be facing off against?
12.title: The Atom (DC Universe)

choices: Giganta is inside when Atom arrives
Giganta is outside when Atom arrives
121.content:
The Ivy Town bank is busy as usual on an ordinary Monday afternoon. People swarm the lobby, but one stands out in particular. An amazonian red-head in a long trench-coat. She has a stunning face and stands an amazing six and a half feet tall, towering over the other patrons of the bank and even the security guard

She walks to the centre of the bank and looks around. Behind the counter is the bank vault. A smile crosses her ruby lips. Suddenly she begins to grow! Her trench-coat stretches and strains for an instant... and then bursts!

Beneath the trench-coat she is wearing a gold and black jumpsuit trimmed with leopard-print. The costume shows off her massive shoulders, heaving bosom, and powerful legs. The bank patrons stand stunned for a moment then chaos erupts, they flee the bank screaming and calling for the police!

The security guard draws his sidearm and opens fire, but by the time the first shot strikes Giganta she is already kneeling to keep from bumping her head on the 30 foot ceiling. The bullets do nothing against a woman of her size!

She smirks and casually swats the security guard. He goes flying across the lobby, through the plate-glass window at the front of the bank and out into traffic!

***

Ray Palmer is lecturing his class on theoretical physics at Ivy Town University when his Justice League communicator goes off. He hurriedly finishes the lecture and ducks into his office to check on where he's needed

The Ivy Town bank is being robbed and he's the closest superhero to the scene of the crime! He springs into action shrinking out of his clothes and revealing his red and blue costume

Like a flea he leaps to the windowsill and boldly dives out into the afternoon breeze, expertly manipulating his weight to ride the wind towards downtown Ivytown
121.title: Giganta

choices: 100 feet tall; the bank vault fits in her hand
200 feet tall; the bank vault fits in her cleavage
400 feet tall; the bank vault disappears into her cleavage
1211.content:
The Atom arrives on the scene and witnesses that the police have already put up a barricade around the street. A SWAT van is pulling up and 10 police cars are on site as well

'What are we dealing with officer?' the Atom asks jumping onto the lead detective's shoulder. He's happy to find she's a stunning blonde

The blonde officer looks down at the Atom and opens her mouth to speak but as she opens her mouth the side of the bank explodes!

Giganta erupts from the side of the bank! She's grown beyond it's confines exploding through the ceiling! Clutched in her hand is the bank vault

Everyone stops to look as she continues to grow towering into the sky!

How big does she grow?
1211.title: Giganta is inside when Atom arrives

13.content: Who will she be facing off against?
13.title: Giganta (DC Universe)
